name: mywallet-extension
description: Mywallet chrome-extension wallet for Utility blockchain
author: Hello Inc <hello@metapool.app>

scripts.build: tsc -b -verbose tsconfig-sourcemap.json && rm -rf test-new-install-ln && ln -sf extension test-new-install-ln
scripts.start: git pull && npm run build && echo done. open the extension form the browser
